# Recommended Next Run

Generated by agent run `2026-02-18-follow-a` on 2026-02-18.

## Agent Recommendations

- **Kernel Expert**: - **Macro**: FOLLOW

## How to Execute

Pick the recommendation you agree with and run:

```fish
gh workflow run "Agent Autonomous Run" --ref dev-revert-main-linux \
  -f macro=<Macro> -f task_command="<command from above>"
```

Or use the GitHub Actions **Run workflow** button with the same values.
